item.description:
If you're interested in starting a yoga practice, or if you already do yoga and want to check this method out, give it a try. Heated yoga is wonderful for people who have achy joints, because the heat loosens you up and lets you move into the pose more easily.

This is a moderate class at Central Mass Yoga, 45 Sterling Street (Route 12), West Boylston, MA 01583
www.centralmassyoga.com

Bring your own mat (if you can--they have some you can borrow), a bottle of water, and a towel. Dress for exercise: shorts and a tee shirt.

I made this for 6:45 so we can meet beforehand at my store downstairs from the studio (The Homebrew Emporium) and get acquainted. I plan to head upstairs at ten 'til.

Free classes tend to fill up quickly, so even if you prefer not to meet downstairs, you should arrive early.
item.name: Free Heated Yoga Class
